Trade/Device Name(s): GlucoSure ADVANCE Link Blood Glucose Monitoring System
GlucoSure ADVANCE Link Blood Glucose Meter
GlucoSure ADVANCE Link Blood Glucose Test Strips
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): GlucoSure ADVANCE Link Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for GlucoSure ADVANCE Link Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood with Bluetooth data transfer capability
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for the quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood by self-testers at home
